name: Don't tell me I cannot make my own MMORPG
name_original: Don't tell me I cannot make my own MMORPG
description:
This is a game made for The Just Fucking Finish Jam.

My second game made in Unity, I wanted to do more a parody game than a game itself so I can learn more about cinemachine, cutscenes, UI, etc. 

The theme of the jam was "illusion of choice", in video games we have plenty of meaningless choices so I tried to put some in my game. Enjoy. 

Follow me on Twitter: (20) Ranv (@ranvln) / Twitter
